title: President Rinkēvičs in Paris
summary_full: On December 15th, Latvian President Edgars Rinkēvičs is on a working visit to Paris, where he is scheduled to meet with French President Emmanuel Macron, Senate President Gérard Larcher, and National Assembly President Yaël Braun-Pivet to discuss bilateral cooperation, European security and defence, support for Ukraine, and other issues on the European Union agenda.
